goals.goal: Describe a project involving cameras and a virtual assistant.
To make a 3D model rotate smoothly.
To use two cameras effectively during a presentation.

interests.evidence: Working on an AI app at a hackathon.
The user mentions 'my bad game' and wants to know how to score.
The user is working on a project involving a virtual assistant.
The user is working on a project involving camera tracking.
The user is asking about it.
The user is currently in the IBDP program and wanted to talk about it.
The user is actively working on a 3D project.
The user knows who Iron Man is and expresses a wish to use an Iron Man model.
The user is working on a 3D model and is concerned with its rotation.
